name: Cut
description: Support you to right-click to cut the file or folder and copy it to the Clipboard. This function allows you to realize quick file location changes. You don't need to spend more time pressing down the Command - X shortcuts to cut an item.

apps.name: Cut
apps.description: Cut the file or folder and copy it to the Clipboard. This function allows you to realize quick file location changes. You don't need to spend more time pressing down the Command - X shortcuts to cut an item.

apps.name: Paste
apps.description: Paste a file or folder from the Clipboard that you've cut just now.

subname: Cut the file in preparation for changing its location.
